Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at Loyola. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at Loyola.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Cumberland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Cumberland.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
